Dear Francesca, 

 

Please find attached the updated version which reflects comments from our Legal team. We have also reviewed the comments from Fendi’s legal team and provided commentary where necessary.

Please let us know if you have any questions. 

 

Thank you, 

 

Vince

 

VINCE MULÉ​​​​

VP ‑ ACCOUNTING

chunks.text:
Apologies for the delay.

Here attached the document with the legal comments. Regarding the termination notice period , legal mentioned 3 months notice, would it be possible to accommodate this request?

 

Dear Mariel,

We would like to remove for now  (not incorporated in the attached document) the activity on the income tax return support and rediscuss further (45kSAR). 

We received a benchmark from one of the sister brands and they directly involve one supplier (EY) that does everything (calculation, certification and submission) and they pay 15.5k USD all included (vs Fendi at 21k USD). 

We can organize a touch base on this topic in the first 2 weeks of February. I remember that Alena mentioned a lower amount expected for the TAX consultant for the Review and certification (-25% vs EY); could you please share with us any update on this if you have?

 

 

Thank you in advance

Best,

Francesca

Dear all,

 

Please find attached the agreement between Fendi and Chalhoub for Accounting and Tax services. 

Apologies for the delay, we had used the wrong template, and Legal advised the correct template we needed to use. 

 

We did take your comments into consideration and updated the agreement.

Please find attached the agreement between Fendi and Chalhoub for Accounting and Tax services. 

Apologies for the delay, we had used the wrong template, and Legal advised the correct template we needed to use. 

 

We did take your comments into consideration and updated the agreement. 

If you are ok with the agreement, you can sign it, and we will then sign it on our side. 

 

Many thanks, and wishing you all a wonderful weekend ahead!

 

Vince

Da: Francesca Volpez <francesca.volpez@fendi.com <mailto:francesca.volpez@fendi.com> > 
Inviato: lunedì 23 dicembre 2024 11:45
A: Stefano Salzano <Stefano.SALZANO@fendi.com <mailto:Stefano.SALZANO@fendi.com> >
Cc: Waqas Ahmad <Waqas.Ahmad@chalhoub.com <mailto:Waqas.Ahmad@chalhoub.com> >; Vince Mulé <Vincenzo.Mule@chalhoub.com <mailto:Vincenzo.Mule@chalhoub.com> >; Muhannad Alhuneidi <Muhannad.Alhuneidi@chalhoub.com <mailto:Muhannad.Alhuneidi@chalhoub.com> >; Arturo Santoro <Arturo.Santoro@fendi.com <mailto:Arturo.Santoro@fendi.com> >; Manuela Leuenberger <Manuela.Leuenberger@fendi.com <mailto:Manuela.Leuenberger@fendi.com> >; Ardea Moraschi <Ardea.Moraschi@fendi.com <mailto:Ardea.Moraschi@fendi.com> >
Oggetto: Re: Fendi x Chalhoub accounting agreement

 

Dear chalhoub team,

 

Any news?

 

Tks 

Best

Francesca

 

Sent from my iPhone

 

	On 19 Dec 2024, at 9:29 AM, Stefano Salzano <Stefano.SALZANO@fendi.com <mailto:Stefano.SALZANO@fendi.com> > wrote:

	﻿ 

	Dear Waqas

	 

	I hope my mail finds you well

	 

	Please find below our comments and in attachment the updated draft of the agreement with the authorized signatory of Fendi Saudi for Trading.

	 

	1.	List of Services (Annex 1): we would like to integrate the list of accounting services as per below proposal: 

	 

	List of Services and Responsabilities

	Services

	Account Receivable 

	1.       Receive and apply customer payments

	2.       Net sales reconciliation

	3.       Bank, cash and credit cards reconciliation

	4.       Ageing

	5.       Create/update vendor accounts

metadata.doc_id: C1NYSLD - fendi x chalhoub accounting agreement\Conversation.txt
metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\C1NYSLD - fendi x chalhoub accounting agreement\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
Account Receivable 

	1.       Receive and apply customer payments

	2.       Net sales reconciliation

	3.       Bank, cash and credit cards reconciliation

	4.       Ageing

	5.       Create/update vendor accounts

	6.       Customer invoice processing

	Account Payable 

	7.       Supplier invoice processing including fixed assets

	8.       Supplier process payments

	9.       Create/update vendor accounts

	10.   VAT declaration

	11.   Invoice/PO maintenance

	12.   T&E management

	Intercompany reconciliation

	13.   AR/AP intercompany reconciliation

	14.   Intercompany recharge

	General accounting & reporting 

	15.   Syrus reporting 

	16.   Tax provision

	17.   Tax reconciliation

	18.   Management of tax inspections

	19.   Statutory financial notes

	20.   Statutory audit

	21.   Reconciliation of audit and Syrus and SAP

	22.   Audit field work

	23.   Security of financial system

	24.   Maintain general ledger

	25.   Expenses accrual / provision

	26.   Books closing

	27.   Accounting policies and procedures

	 

	2.	Compliance: we propose to include in the same agreement also the services for monthly and annual tax compliance with the fees agreed with Alena as per below:  

	 

	1.       Monthly tax compliance fees:

	1.       VAT: USD 630 (excl VAT) per return  

	2.       Withholding Tax: USD 630 (excl VAT) per return

	 

	2.       Annual tax compliance fees

	1.       Annual tax support service fee is USD 12,000 (excl VAT).

	 

	If you agree with above proposal, the agreement will cover full accounting & compliance services

	 

	Thank you

	Kind regards

	Waqas

From: Sayed Sharaf <Sayed.Sharaf@chalhoub.com>
To: Vince Mulé <Vincenzo.Mule@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Mariel Yard <Mariel.Yard@chalhoub.com>; Carlos Daoud <Carlos.Daoud@chalhoub.com>; Sultan Ulhaq Mohammed <Sultanulhaq.Mohammed@chalhoub.com>

Subject: FW: Fendi x Chalhoub accounting agreement
--------------------------------------------------
Hi Vince,

 

I spoke with @Hagop <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> , and it seems we don’t have such a policy in place. For now, we should request Fendi to exclude it as the indemnity clause should be sufficient.

chunks.text:
I spoke with @Hagop <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> , and it seems we don’t have such a policy in place. For now, we should request Fendi to exclude it as the indemnity clause should be sufficient.

 

If they insist, they would need to cover the additional cost for Hagop to implement such insurance policy.

 

Attached is the updated version to be shared with them with our comment.

 

Best,

Sayed Adnan

 

SAYED SHARAF​​​​
